trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Définit des méthodes et des propriétés pour écrire une <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> method in order to obtain a fixed-document writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> méthode afin d’obtenir un writer de document fixe pour ajouter <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> contenu à un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Ajoute un nouvel objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> au <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A writer for outputting the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer permettant de restituer le nouveau <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple suivant illustre l'utilisation de la méthode <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The image type of the thumbnail to add.
trans-unit.target: Type d'image de la miniature à ajouter.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Ajoute une image <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> pour le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Nouvelle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: Par exemple, le `imageType` peut être <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

trans-unit.source: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document as a whole (although individual pages can have their own thumbnail images).
trans-unit.target: Seule une image miniature peut représenter le document dans son ensemble (bien que des pages individuelles peuvent avoir leurs propres images miniatures).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called when the document already has a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> est levée si <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> est appelé lorsque le document a déjà une miniature.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> writer.
trans-unit.target: Vide et ferme le writer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> writer.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.Commit%2A> méthode pour vider et fermer le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> writer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la position de base zéro du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> dans la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Position de base zéro du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> dans la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> property is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> propriété est de base zéro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> value of zero (0) indicates the first the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> la valeur zéro (0) indique le premier le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> dans le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

trans-unit.source: Sets default print options for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Définit des options d'impression par défaut pour le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété ne pas valider ou modifier le texte spécifié <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> en tant <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Si nécessaire, utilisez la méthode <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> pour créer un <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> spécifique à la <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> et valide pour l'imprimante donnée.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.PrintTicket%2A> propriété à associer un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> avec un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
